com.rshepard.blackjack.interfaces

Interface State

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BetState, CheckWinState, DealerTurnState, DealState, HitStandState, HitState, NewGameState, StandState

    public interface State
    State interface defines the overall functionality of the states of the game
